a̠psu ya-ya a̠psu-a̠psu ya ōṣa̍dhīṣu̠-ōṣa̍dhīṣu̠ ya a̠psu-a̠psu ya ōṣa̍dhīṣu̠** ya ōṣa̍dhīṣu̠-ōṣa̍dhīṣu̠ ya-ya ōṣa̍dhīṣu̠ yō-yō ōṣa̍dhīṣu̠ ya-ya ōṣa̍dhīṣu̠ yō** ōṣa̍dhīṣu̠ yō-yō ōṣa̍dhīṣu̠-ōṣa̍dhīṣu̠ mṛtyu̍rmē pā̠hi-pā̠hi mṛtyu̍rmē ** pā̠hi** ** </ghana_padamu> <name>  trya̍mbakaṃ yajāmahē suga̠ndhi-mpu̍ṣ</name> <order>38</order> <padamu display_value="Sri Rudram">a79e9faec327461049521d12b4013105</padamu> <padamustring>  trya̍mbakaṃ yajāmahē suga̠ndhi-mpu̍ṣṭi̠vardha̍nam । u̠rvā̠ru̠kami̍va̠ bandha̍nānmṛtyō̍rmukṣīya̠ mā-'mṛtā̎t । yō ru̠drō a̠gnau yō a̠psu ya ōṣa̍dhīṣu̠ yō ru̠drō viśvā̠ bhuva̍nā vi̠vēśa̠ tasmai̍ ru̠drāya̠ namō̍ astu । tamu̍ ṣṭu̠hi̠ ya-ssvi̠ṣussu̠dhanvā̠ yō viśva̍sya̠ kṣaya̍ti bhēṣa̠jasya̍ । yakṣvā̎ma̠hē sau̎mana̠sāya̍ ru̠dra-nnamō̎bhirdē̠vamasu̍ra-nduvasya । a̠ya-mmē̠ hastō̠ bhaga̍vāna̠ya-mmē̠ bhaga̍vattaraḥ । a̠ya-mmē̎ vi̠śvabhē̎ṣajō̠-'yagṃ śi̠vābhi̍mar​śanaḥ । yē tē̍ sa̠hasra̍ma̠yuta̠-mpāśā̠ mṛtyō̠ martyā̍ya̠ hanta̍vē । tān ya̠jñasya̍ mā̠yayā̠ sarvā̠nava̍ yajāmahē । mṛ̠tyavē̠ svāhā̍ mṛ̠tyavē̠ svāhā̎ । ō-nnamō bhagavatē rudrāya viṣṇavē mṛtyu̍rmē pā̠hi </padamustring> ru̠dra-nnamō̎bhirdē̠vamasu̍ra-nduvasya hastō̠ bhaga̍vāna̠ya-mmē̠ bhaga̍vattaraḥ vi̠śvabhē̎ṣajō̠-'yagṃ śi̠vābhi̍mar​śanaḥ tē̍ sa̠hasra̍ma̠yuta̠-mpāśā̠ mṛtyō̠ martyā̍ya̠ hanta̍vē ya̠jñasya̍ mā̠yayā̠ sarvā̠nava̍ yajāmahē svāhā̍ mṛ̠tyavē̠ svāhā̎ bhagavatē rudrāya viṣṇavē mṛtyu̍rmē pā̠hi </word_list> </x_146833_vedamwork_ghanapadamu> </record_update>
